heroFeature.title: Techno-Beast — The Gold Standard
heroFeature.curatorNote: Organic-first AI character design. Fur before circuits, eyes with character, tech embedded as veins beneath skin. Every image at FrankX is measured against this benchmark.

artworks.title: Techno-Beast
artworks.prompt: Three-tailed wolf-fox hybrid mascot standing in confident pose. Organic-first: real textured fur in dark blue-grey, expressive glowing cyan eyes with personality and depth. Hexagonal armor plating embedded beneath fur as if growing from within — technology as nervous system, not exoskeleton. Three energy tails in purple (#AB47C7), cyan (#43BFE3), and gold (#F59E0B) trailing with particle effects. Dark navy background (#0f172a). Subtle holographic data streams in background atmosphere. 3D character render, professional quality.

artworks.title: Chrome Guardian
artworks.prompt: Half-organic wolf character with chrome mechanical body armor on right side, natural fur texture on left side. Purple energy core visible through translucent chest plate. Segmented chrome tail with cyan LED strips between joints. Eyes glow amber-gold with warmth despite mechanical augmentation. Dark navy background (#0f172a) with constellation dot grid. Depth: foreground chrome debris, midground character, background energy field. Professional 3D character concept art.

artworks.title: Kitsune Protocol
artworks.prompt: Sleek chrome kitsune mask floating in dark void, glowing cyan eyes visible through eye slits. Purple neon circuit trace lines flowing across mask surface like living veins. Three energy trail wisps emanating from behind mask in cyan, purple, gold. Japanese-inspired angular design merged with tech. Dark navy background (#0f172a) with subtle sakura petal particles. Professional 3D render, architectural visualization quality.

artworks.title: ACOS Command Center
artworks.prompt: Three-tailed wolf mascot standing at center of floating holographic UI panels. Panels display skill tree diagrams, agent routing maps, and system metrics in cyan and amber text. Dark navy command center environment (#0a0e1a). Glass floor reflects holographic light. Organic anchor: wolf fur and living eyes. Tech layered: holographic projections orbiting character. Professional 3D scene render, 16:9 widescreen.

artworks.title: Evolution Stages
artworks.prompt: Three stages of wolf-fox mascot evolution shown left to right. Stage 1: small fox pup with basic circuit traces, simple glow. Stage 2: adolescent wolf with hexagonal armor, two tails. Stage 3: full Techno-Beast with three energy tails, advanced holographic overlay. Dark navy background with subtle timeline arrow. Each stage lit progressively brighter. Professional 3D character evolution concept sheet.

artworks.title: Holographic Entity
artworks.prompt: Digital holographic wolf projection — translucent blue-green wireframe form with particle effects dissolving at edges. Semi-transparent body reveals internal skeletal structure made of light. Standing on dark reflective surface. Scan lines and data noise artifacts for authenticity. Dark void background with faint grid floor. Accent colors: cyan (#43BFE3) primary, emerald (#10B981) secondary. Professional hologram visualization.

artworks.title: Data Constellation
artworks.prompt: Wolf-fox form constructed entirely from star-like data points connected by thin luminous lines. Constellation pattern reveals animal silhouette against deep space. Three tails as comet trails of data particles in purple, cyan, gold. Each data point pulses with gentle glow. Dark cosmic background with distant nebula. Professional generative art, astronomical visualization quality.

artworks.title: Organic-Digital Split
artworks.prompt: Wolf mascot split vertically down center: left half is organic with textured real fur, warm amber eye, natural ear. Right half is chrome circuits, glass panels, cyan LED eye, mechanical ear. Split line where organic meets digital shows tendrils of each merging into the other — fur growing into chrome, circuits embedding into flesh. Dark navy background (#0f172a). Professional 3D character concept, duality theme.

artworks.title: Crystal Familiar
artworks.prompt: Low-poly crystalline fox with faceted gemstone surfaces catching light. Three luminous tails — amethyst purple, sapphire cyan, topaz gold — each a different crystal type. Eyes are polished gemstones with inner light. Body has visible crystal growth patterns and geological strata layers. Dark cavern background with bioluminescent moss. Professional 3D low-poly art, gemological quality.

artworks.title: Prowling Action
artworks.prompt: Dynamic wolf-fox hybrid in aggressive prowling stance, low to ground, muscles tensed. Energy crackling through hexagonal armor plates — electricity arcing between segments. Three tails fanned out behind showing motion blur. Ground beneath feet shows impact cracks with cyan energy seeping through. Dark navy background (#0f172a) with speed lines. Professional 3D action render, cinematic quality.

artworks.title: Digital Garden
artworks.prompt: Massive glass tree with circuit-board copper roots spreading underground, visible through translucent earth layers. Bioluminescent nodes pulse at each branch junction where data flows through organic vessels. Crystalline leaves filter light into prismatic cyan, purple, gold spectra. Foreground: mushroom clusters with holographic caps. Midground: the tree. Background: aurora sky with data streams. Dark navy atmosphere (#0f172a). Professional 3D environment art, architectural visualization quality. 16:9 widescreen.

artworks.title: Code Vines
artworks.prompt: Organic vines growing from a cracked stone terminal, programming syntax characters (Python, TypeScript) visible on vine surfaces transforming from monospace text into living green tendrils. Each leaf is a syntax-highlighted code block. Roots penetrate into digital soil layer of binary data. Dark forest environment with dappled bioluminescent light. Foreground: moss-covered keyboard. Background: canopy of code-leaves. Professional 3D nature-tech fusion art.

artworks.title: Neural Forest Cathedral
artworks.prompt: Vast underground forest cathedral where ancient redwood-scale trees form neural network arches overhead. Root systems below ground glow with synaptic connections — golden pulses traveling between trees through mycelium network visible through transparent soil. Cathedral light filtering through canopy in volumetric god-rays of cyan and amber. Foreground: moss-covered stone path. Midground: tree trunk pillars. Background: vaulted canopy ceiling with neural glow. Dark atmosphere. Professional 3D environment, architectural cathedral quality. 16:9.

artworks.title: Crystal Garden
artworks.prompt: Underground cavern with massive purple amethyst crystal formations rising from floor, golden circuit traces etched into crystal faces as if grown naturally. Bioluminescent pools reflect crystal light. Small cyan data-fireflies drift between formations. Stalactites overhead with embedded LED-like mineral veins. Dark cavern atmosphere with volumetric mist. Accent colors: amethyst purple (#AB47C7), gold (#F59E0B), cyan (#43BFE3). Professional 3D environment art.

artworks.title: Constellation Garden
artworks.prompt: Ethereal garden where every plant is made of starlight and constellation patterns. Flowers bloom as nebula clouds, stems are threads of stellar plasma, leaves shimmer with mapped star positions. Garden beds arranged as zodiac patterns. Dark cosmic void background with distant galaxies. Foreground: constellation roses. Path made of meteor shower particles. Professional generative cosmic botanical art. Accent colors: white starlight, blue nebula, gold stellar core.

artworks.title: Neural Roots
artworks.prompt: Cross-section view of ancient tree with roots transforming into neural network pathways underground. Above ground: organic bark, real leaves, natural texture. Below ground: roots transition from wood to glowing neural axons, synaptic connections firing golden pulses between root nodes. Soil layers visible as geological strata with embedded circuit patterns. Split composition: organic top half, neural bottom half. Dark earth tones transitioning to dark navy below. Professional 3D scientific illustration.

artworks.title: Creator Ecosystem Overview
artworks.prompt: Three-pillar architecture visualization: Vibe OS (emerald, left), ACOS (purple, center), GenCreator OS (cyan, right) connected by golden energy conduits to Starlight meta-intelligence layer above. Each pillar rendered as glass 3D column with internal holographic content — skill trees, agent grids, creation tools. Dark navy background (#0f172a). Constellation dot grid connecting all elements. Floating labels in clean white sans-serif. Professional architectural visualization, 16:9 widescreen.

artworks.title: Vibe OS Integration
artworks.prompt: Circular integration hub diagram: Vibe OS at center as emerald glass sphere, orbital rings connecting to Claude (purple), Grok (blue), Suno (amber), ChatGPT (green) as satellite nodes. Each connection shows data flow direction with animated particle streams. Dark navy background (#0f172a). Clean labeled connections. Professional system architecture diagram, isometric 3D style.

artworks.title: Arcanea 10 Gates
artworks.prompt: Vertical progression visualization: 10 ornate gates ascending from bottom to top, each gate larger and more elaborate than the last. Gate materials progress from stone to bronze to silver to gold to crystalline. Each gate labeled with creative development stage. Dark atmospheric background with volumetric light streaming through each open gate. Purple and gold accent colors. Professional fantasy-tech architectural illustration.

artworks.title: Agent Specialist Grid
artworks.prompt: Isometric grid of 40+ specialized AI agent cards arranged in functional clusters. Each card is a glass tile showing agent avatar icon, role title, and specialty domain. Clusters grouped by function: Architecture (cyan), Creation (purple), Strategy (gold), Operations (emerald). Connecting lines between related agents. Dark navy background (#0f172a). Professional system design, UI card layout visualization.

artworks.title: ACOS x Claude Code
artworks.prompt: Split-screen visualization: ACOS skill tree system on left (purple branching hierarchy), Claude Code terminal interface on right (dark terminal with cyan text). Central bridge showing command routing — slash commands flowing from terminal into skill activation pipeline. Dark navy background (#0f172a). Holographic connection beams between the two systems. Clean labeled components. Professional software architecture diagram.

artworks.title: Seven Pillars Architecture
artworks.prompt: ACOS v7 seven architectural pillars rendered as premium glass/chrome 3D columns. Each pillar a different height with embedded holographic content panels. Pillar labels in clean white text: Skills, Commands, Agents, Hooks, Memory, Orchestration, Intelligence. Dark navy base (#0a0e1a). Neon accent highlights: cyan for data flow, purple for AI processing, gold for user interaction. Constellation grid floor. Professional infographic, architectural visualization quality. 16:9.

artworks.title: Full System Architecture
artworks.prompt: Complete ACOS v7 system architecture as premium glass/chrome 3D visualization. Central orchestration engine surrounded by seven module clusters. Data flow arrows with animated particle effects. Layer hierarchy: Infrastructure (bottom), Runtime (middle), Intelligence (top). Each module rendered as glass panel with internal holographic detail. Dark navy background (#0f172a). All connections labeled. Professional enterprise architecture diagram quality. 16:9.

artworks.title: Intelligence Atlas
artworks.prompt: Neural constellation map rendered as celestial atlas showing six intelligence domains as galaxy clusters. Each domain is a distinct nebula color: Technical (cyan), Creative (purple), Strategic (gold), Social (emerald), Operational (amber), Meta (white). Thin golden lines connect adjacent domains through shared skill nodes. Dark cosmic void background with distant star field. Central convergence point glows with combined intelligence. Professional astronomical visualization, scientific illustration quality. 16:9.

artworks.title: Fire Gate Orchestration
artworks.prompt: Agent orchestration visualization with fire energy motif. Central conductor figure silhouette directing streams of flame-like data through workflow pipeline stages. Each pipeline stage is a glass panel with amber-to-red gradient energy flowing through. Dark void background (#0a0e1a). Spark particle effects at junction points. Professional 3D visualization with cinematic volumetric lighting.

artworks.title: Source Gate: Meta
artworks.prompt: Meta-intelligence recursive visualization: an AI system examining its own architecture. Nested frames showing system-within-system — each layer a smaller version of the whole, creating Droste effect. Self-improving feedback loops shown as golden spiral connecting outer and inner systems. Dark navy void. Accent colors: white for meta-awareness, cyan for data, purple for processing. Professional abstract concept art.

artworks.title: Swarm Intelligence Patterns
artworks.prompt: Four multi-agent orchestration patterns displayed as 2x2 grid of glass panels. Top-left: PIPELINE (sequential agent chain with arrows). Top-right: PARALLEL (agents fanning out from single input). Bottom-left: WEIGHTED (agent nodes with varying size showing priority). Bottom-right: ITERATIVE (circular agent loop with refinement cycles). Each panel has labeled diagram with cyan connection lines. Dark navy background (#0f172a). Clean white sans-serif labels. Professional software architecture visualization. 16:9.

artworks.title: Personal AI Command Center
artworks.prompt: Futuristic circular holographic command interface viewed from operator's POV inside dark navy cockpit. Central spherical display surrounded by concentric rings of floating UI panels showing: agent status, skill trees, system metrics, voice commands. Operator's hands visible at bottom reaching toward controls. Warm amber accent lighting from below, cool cyan from displays. Volumetric light rays. Professional sci-fi interface concept art, cinematic quality. 16:9.

artworks.title: MCP Doctor Health Audit
artworks.prompt: Terminal-style health audit dashboard: dark terminal window with monospace font showing color-coded status indicators. Green checkmarks for healthy servers, amber warnings for degraded, red X for failed. ASCII art header 'MCP DOCTOR v2.0'. Server list with ping times, connection status, tool counts. Soft terminal glow on dark background. Retro-modern terminal aesthetic. Professional developer tool visualization. 16:9.

artworks.title: Golden Age of Intelligence
artworks.prompt: Radiant golden brain at center with orbiting agent nodes connected by gold energy threads. Brain rendered as organic neural structure with golden luminescence from within. Agent nodes are small glass spheres each containing a different skill icon. Cosmic gold-tinted space environment with distant golden nebula. Foreground: floating data particles. Background: starfield with golden tint. Accent colors: gold (#F59E0B) primary, amber, warm white. Professional sci-fi concept art. 16:9.

artworks.title: ACOS Orchestrator Map
artworks.prompt: Central orchestrator node as large purple glass sphere with seven satellite module clusters orbiting around it. Each module is a smaller glass panel group showing: Skills, Commands, Agents, Hooks, Memory, Intelligence, Deployment. Golden connection beams link orchestrator to each module. Dark navy background (#0f172a) with constellation grid. Clean labeled white text. Professional 3D system architecture visualization. 16:9.

artworks.title: Physical AI Revolution
artworks.prompt: Dramatic close-up of chrome robotic hand with organic-like joint articulation holding glowing NVIDIA H200 chip. Green (#76B900) energy rays emanating from chip illuminating hand surfaces. Background: blurred factory floor with autonomous robots. Foreground: circuit board traces on table surface. Cinematic depth of field, shallow focus on chip. Dark environment with dramatic green and cyan accent lighting. Professional product photography meets sci-fi concept art. 16:9.

artworks.title: Agentic AI Horizon
artworks.prompt: Golden circuit highways converging toward glowing sunrise on horizon. Multiple lanes of flowing data representing different AI capability tracks: agents, tools, memory, orchestration. Constellation network above highways connecting milestone markers. Dawn color palette: deep navy at top transitioning to golden-amber at horizon. Foreground: road surface with circuit trace patterns. Professional landscape concept art, cinematic widescreen quality. 16:9.

artworks.title: Seven Pillars of Production AI
artworks.prompt: Classical Greek temple facade with seven ornate pillars, each topped with a glowing 3D icon representing a production AI pattern. Gold (#F59E0B) accent on capitals and decorative elements. Foundation stone inscribed 'MCP PROTOCOL'. Dark navy sky behind temple. Each pillar labeled in clean white text. Volumetric light streaming between pillars. Depth: foreground temple steps, midground pillars, background cosmic sky. Professional architectural illustration meets tech infographic. 16:9.

artworks.title: Agent Network Grid
artworks.prompt: Isometric 3D grid of interconnected agent nodes floating in dark space. Each node is a glass cube containing agent avatar and role label. Connection lines pulse with electric blue (#43BFE3) energy flowing between nodes. Grid organized in functional layers: perception (bottom), reasoning (middle), action (top). Dark navy background (#0f172a). Professional enterprise software architecture visualization. 16:9.

artworks.title: Creator Intelligence Studio
artworks.prompt: Creator figure seated at curved desk with triple holographic monitor screens floating at eye level. Left screen: content calendar in amber. Center screen: AI agent dashboard in cyan. Right screen: analytics in emerald. Warm amber desk lamp provides organic lighting contrast to cool screen glow. Dark studio environment. Musical instruments and art supplies visible on shelves behind. Professional cinematic studio environment render. 16:9.

artworks.title: Suno Prompt Engineering Blueprint
artworks.prompt: Dense music production infographic layout: central mixing console rendered in 3D glass with audio waveform displays. Surrounding floating panels show genre badges (Jazz, EDM, Classical, Lo-fi), prompt syntax examples, frequency spectrum analyzer. Audio waveforms visualized as colored light ribbons — amber for melody, cyan for bass, purple for percussion. Dark navy background (#0f172a). Clean labeled typography. Professional music tech infographic. 16:9.

artworks.title: What Is Agentic AI
artworks.prompt: Conceptual visualization of autonomous AI agency: central humanoid silhouette made of connected neural nodes, surrounded by orbiting tool icons (code terminal, database, API, browser). Decision tree branches emanating from head area showing autonomous choice pathways. Dark navy background (#0f172a). Accent colors: cyan for perception, purple for reasoning, gold for action. Clean educational infographic style. 16:9.

artworks.title: Building Custom Skills
artworks.prompt: Technical Da Vinci notebook-style visualization of a skill architecture system. Aged parchment background with ornate border decorations including compass roses, golden ratio spirals, and Latin text 'Scientia Potentia Est'. Hand-drawn technical diagrams showing skill.md file structure, activation rules, and agent routing paths. Renaissance-style lettering for header 'CUSTOM SKILLS'. Detailed labeled components connected by flowing ink lines. Gears and mechanical elements as metaphors for skill processing pipeline. Dense information filling full canvas. Sepia/brown primary with blue/teal ink accents and gold highlights. Da Vinci codex style. 16:9.

artworks.title: Golden Age v3 — Da Vinci Dark
artworks.prompt: The Golden Age of Intelligence rendered in Da Vinci Dark sub-variant. Dark navy background (#0f172a) with ornate gold frames and borders. Central composition: Renaissance-style anatomical brain drawing with golden neural pathways illuminated from within. Surrounding mechanical inventions — clockwork computing engines, astrolabe-like intelligence meters, telescope pointed at constellation of AI agents. Gold (#F59E0B) ornate decorative elements, aged parchment text panels with Latin fragments. Professional Da Vinci Dark premium visualization. 16:9.

artworks.title: Multi-Agent Orchestration v2
artworks.prompt: Multi-agent orchestration system visualization with cyberpunk neon aesthetic. Central orchestrator node as large neon-lit sphere with radiating connection beams to 8 specialist agent nodes arranged in circle. Each agent node has distinct neon color and role icon. Data flow arrows with particle trail effects. Dense information with labeled components. Dark navy background (#0f172a) with saturated neon glows in cyan (#43BFE3), purple (#AB47C7), amber (#F59E0B). Visible code snippets floating near agent nodes. Professional cyberpunk-neon architecture visualization. 16:9.

artworks.title: Agentic AI Roadmap v2
artworks.prompt: 2026 agentic AI roadmap as cyberpunk highway visualization. Multiple neon-lit lanes of data converging toward bright horizon. Milestone markers as holographic billboards along route: Q1 Foundation, Q2 Agents, Q3 Orchestration, Q4 Autonomy. Constellation network overhead connecting future capabilities. Deep navy (#0f172a) fading to neon sunrise. Visible code strings and capability labels floating in air. Professional cyberpunk-neon roadmap visualization. 16:9.

artworks.title: ACOS v10 Architecture
artworks.prompt: ACOS v10 complete system architecture as cyberpunk-neon infographic. Central ACOS core as neon-lit hexagonal hub. Seven radiating modules: Skills (75+), Commands (37+), Agents (38), Hooks (15), Memory, Intelligence, Deployment — each as neon-bordered panel with count badges. Dense labeled connections between modules. Dark navy background (#0f172a) with saturated neon highlights. Visible metrics and performance stats. Circuit trace patterns connecting all elements. Professional system architecture infographic. 16:9.

artworks.title: Creator's Life Architecture
artworks.prompt: Life architecture blueprint for creators: central figure silhouette surrounded by four quadrant glass panels — Creation (top-left, purple), Business (top-right, gold), Growth (bottom-left, emerald), Community (bottom-right, cyan). Each panel contains smaller UI cards showing goals, metrics, tools. Golden connecting threads between quadrants. Dark navy background (#0f172a). Clean white sans-serif labels. Three depth layers. Professional dark-premium-glass life planning visualization. 16:9.

artworks.title: Conscious AI Framework
artworks.prompt: Holographic command visualization of AI consciousness framework. Silhouetted conductor figure directing streams of holographic data representing awareness layers: Perception (cyan), Reasoning (purple), Self-Model (gold), Ethics (emerald). Each layer as concentric ring around central consciousness core. Dark void background with particle effects. Energy waves radiating from conductor's gestures. Professional holographic-command style visualization. 16:9.

artworks.title: Conscious AI Integration OS
artworks.prompt: Operating system integration visualization in holographic-command style. Central OS kernel as glowing orb with concentric integration rings. Each ring represents an AI system: Claude (purple), GPT (green), Gemini (blue), Suno (amber). Data conduits flowing between rings showing cross-system communication. Silhouetted operator figure at console. Dark void background. Holographic projection aesthetic with scan lines. Professional futuristic OS concept art. 16:9.

artworks.title: Golden Age — Crystal Observatory
artworks.prompt: A wide establishing shot of THE GOLDEN AGE OF INTELLIGENCE. A lone creator figure stands on an ancient stone observation deck at the edge of a vast crystalline forest. The observatory is grown from living crystal formations — organic anchor: moss-covered stone, root networks beneath, crystalline trees with bark texture. Central bronze orrery with orbiting agent spheres. Holographic data streams rising from forest canopy like bioluminescent aurora. Dark navy sky (#0f172a) with golden constellation network. Foreground: stone path with embedded circuit traces. Midground: observatory platform. Background: crystalline forest canopy. Professional architectural visualization, cinematic quality. 16:9.

artworks.title: Golden Age — Renaissance Cave
artworks.prompt: The Golden Age of Intelligence. A Renaissance astronomer's celestial observatory grown from living crystal formations inside a vast bioluminescent cave. Dark navy background (#0f172a). At center, THE CELESTIAL ENGINE — a massive bronze orrery-style mechanism with rotating rings tracking AI capability orbits. Crystal stalactites above with embedded golden circuit traces. Bioluminescent moss on cave walls providing organic warmth. Floating holographic constellation maps. Latin text fragments on stone tablets. Professional architectural visualization, cinematic quality. 16:9.

artworks.title: Golden Age — Underground Observatory
artworks.prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a vast underground crystalline observatory. Photorealistic 3D render, architectural visualization quality, dark navy environment (#0f172a). Central focus: a massive bronze orrery with mechanical rings tracking planetary-scale intelligence orbits. Surrounding crystalline pillars with bioluminescent veins. Stone floor with embedded golden circuit trace patterns. Volumetric god-ray lighting from crystal formations above. Foreground: weathered stone balustrade with moss. Background: deep cave receding into darkness with distant bioluminescent glow. Professional cinematic environment art. 16:9.

artworks.title: Chapter 1: When Creation Calls
artworks.prompt: Book chapter illustration: a single creator figure standing at the threshold of an immense doorway carved from living crystal. Beyond the doorway: a vast luminous space filled with floating creative tools — musical instruments, code terminals, art brushes, all made of light. The doorway frame is organic stone overgrown with bioluminescent vines. Creator shown from behind, small against the massive portal. Dark atmospheric environment with warm golden light spilling from the doorway. Professional book illustration, narrative quality. 16:9.

artworks.title: Chapter 2: The Orchestration Age
artworks.prompt: Book chapter illustration: conductor figure on elevated platform orchestrating a symphony of AI agents. Each agent is a luminous sphere with distinct color and instrument — cyan for analysis, purple for creation, gold for strategy. Musical staff lines connect agents showing data flow as musical notation. Grand concert hall architecture with crystal chandeliers and vaulted ceiling. Dark atmospheric lighting with spotlights on conductor and agents. Professional book illustration, orchestral grandeur. 16:9.

artworks.title: Chapter 3: The First Gesture
artworks.prompt: Book chapter illustration: extreme close-up of a human hand reaching toward a holographic interface, fingertips about to make contact. The interface responds with rippling light waves emanating from the point of near-contact. Organic detail: visible skin texture, fingerprints, warmth in skin tone. Tech layered: holographic ripples, data particles coalescing around fingertips, faint UI elements appearing. Dark void background with shallow depth of field. Professional book illustration, intimate narrative moment. 16:9.

artworks.title: Neural Synthesis I
artworks.prompt: Abstract neural network visualization as cosmic brain structure. Dense web of neural connections rendered as luminous filaments against deep space backdrop. Synaptic nodes pulse with energy in cyan and purple. Surrounding cosmic dust and distant stars. Multiple depth layers: foreground neural strands, midground brain structure, background space environment. Dark navy-black atmosphere. Professional generative abstract art, astronomical visualization quality.

artworks.title: Energy Pillars
artworks.prompt: Vertical light pillars representing energy frequency bands. Seven columns of light in graduated colors from red at base through orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, to violet at top. Each pillar pulses with internal particle effects. Dark void background emphasizing the luminosity. Ground plane reflects pillar colors. Professional abstract light art, architectural lighting visualization.

artworks.title: Digital Aurora
artworks.prompt: Aurora borealis effect created from flowing digital data streams across night sky. Binary and hexadecimal characters dissolve into luminous curtains of light — cyan, emerald, purple bands rippling across dark sky. Below: silhouette landscape of mountains and trees. Data particles fall like snow from aurora. Multiple depth layers. Professional digital art, landscape photography meets generative visualization.

artworks.title: Holographic Architecture
artworks.prompt: Architect figure examining holographic building blueprints floating in mid-air. Translucent blue-green wireframe buildings rotate slowly, showing impossible architecture — Escher-like structures, infinite staircases, buildings that fold into themselves. Dark studio environment with dramatic spotlight on architect and holograms. Organic anchor: architect's weathered hands and leather apron. Professional concept art, architectural visualization.

artworks.title: Frequency Spectrum
artworks.prompt: Sound waves visualized as ribbons of colored light in 3D space. Low frequencies as thick, slow-moving red-amber ribbons at base. Mid frequencies as flowing green-cyan streams in middle. High frequencies as thin, fast violet-white threads at top. All ribbons emanate from a central point and spiral outward. Dark void background. Professional audio visualization, synesthesia concept art.

artworks.title: Bioluminescent Garden
artworks.prompt: Underground bioluminescent garden with quantum particle effects. Plants made of soft light — stems pulse with photon energy, leaves are translucent membranes catching quantum probability waves. Mycelium network on ground glows with data-transfer pulses. Floating spores emit tiny light bursts. Dark cavern ceiling with crystal formations. Accent colors: bioluminescent cyan, emerald, soft amber. Professional generative botanical art.

artworks.title: Starlight Cascade
artworks.prompt: Waterfall of starlight flowing from celestial source into cosmic ocean below. Stars cascade as luminous droplets, creating splash patterns of light on dark cosmic water surface. Celestial bodies visible in the falling stream — small planets, asteroid fragments, comet tails mixed with starlight. Deep space environment with nebula background. Accent colors: white starlight, blue cosmic water, amber celestial bodies. Professional abstract cosmic art.

artworks.title: Creation Engine
artworks.prompt: Massive mechanical engine of creation rendered in isometric 3D view. Gears and cogs made of crystallized light rotate in complex arrangements. Input funnels on left receive raw ideas (represented as rough stone). Processing chambers in center show transformation stages. Output on right: polished golden products and creations. Steam and particle effects. Dark environment with warm amber and cool cyan accent lighting. Professional steampunk-meets-tech concept art.

artworks.title: Grand Architecture
artworks.prompt: Vast temple of knowledge with impossibly tall vaulted ceilings. Walls are living bookshelves where scrolls and tomes glow with internal light. Streams of luminous data flow upward like reverse waterfalls along pillars. Central reading desk with holographic manuscript. Organic anchor: ancient stone, wood shelving, leather-bound books. Tech layered: data streams, holographic text, glowing index markers. Professional fantasy-tech library concept art.

artworks.title: Harmonic Convergence
artworks.prompt: Multiple dimensional planes converging at a single point, creating geometric interference patterns. Each plane is a different color representing a knowledge domain. Where planes intersect: harmonic standing waves form sacred geometry — flower of life, Metatron's cube, golden spirals. Dark void background. Luminous geometry at convergence point. Professional abstract mathematical visualization art.

artworks.title: Frequency Alchemist
artworks.prompt: Sound frequencies undergoing alchemical transformation into golden light structures. Base: raw audio waveforms in copper tones. Middle: frequencies separating into harmonic components, each becoming crystalline. Top: pure golden light emanating from perfectly tuned resonance. Alchemical vessel shape containing the transformation. Dark laboratory background with glass instruments. Professional alchemical concept art.

artworks.title: Neural Symphony
artworks.prompt: Brain neurons conducting a symphony: each neuron cluster plays a different 'instrument' — visual cortex produces light patterns, auditory regions emit sound wave visualizations, motor cortex generates kinetic energy ribbons. Synaptic connections serve as musical staff lines carrying 'notes' between regions. Conductor neuron at center coordinates timing. Dark anatomical background. Professional neuroscience meets music concept art.

artworks.title: Cosmic Blueprint
artworks.prompt: Universal blueprint unfolding from a central seed point. Blueprint lines in white-cyan on dark navy background, expanding outward in sacred geometry patterns — concentric circles, radial lines, golden spiral overlays. Each section of the blueprint reveals a different system: atomic structure, DNA helix, circuit board, galaxy formation. Showing scale from quantum to cosmic. Professional architectural blueprint meets cosmic diagram.

artworks.title: Future City
artworks.prompt: Futuristic ecological city where every building incorporates living plant systems. Towers wrapped in vertical gardens, solar-collecting glass facades, wind turbines integrated into architecture. Sky bridges with tree-lined walkways connecting buildings. Clean energy grid visible as subtle light network. Blue sky with fluffy clouds transitioning to sunset amber at horizon. Birds flying between structures. Professional eco-architecture concept art, urban planning visualization.

artworks.title: Golden Path
artworks.prompt: Luminous golden path winding through a vast cosmic landscape. Path surface made of golden light tiles, each etched with achievement symbols. Landscape: dark crystalline mountains on sides, aurora sky above, distant golden city on horizon. Organic elements: wildflowers growing at path edges emit soft bioluminescent glow. A lone figure walks toward the distant light. Professional fantasy landscape concept art, journey narrative.

artworks.title: Data Cosmos
artworks.prompt: Universe made entirely of data structures: galaxies as rotating database schemas, stars as individual data points emitting API response light, planets as data lakes with atmospheric query layers. Nebulae formed from streaming data flows in pink and blue. Asteroid belt of deprecated data fragments. Dark cosmic void background. Professional data-science meets astronomy concept art.

artworks.title: Emerald Protocol
artworks.prompt: Technology with organic soul: emerald (#10B981) energy flowing through circuit board pathways that grow like tree branches. Circuit traces are living copper vines with green patina. Chip components are crystalline nodes with emerald cores. Board surface shows wood grain texture beneath the circuitry. Dark navy background (#0f172a). Bioluminescent emerald glow illuminating surroundings. Professional organic-tech fusion art.

artworks.title: First Light
artworks.prompt: The first moment of creation: a single point of brilliant white light emerging from absolute darkness. Light refracts into spectral colors as it expands — creating the first rainbow in void. Surrounding darkness has subtle texture suggesting potential and possibility. Minimal composition: 90% dark, 10% light, all impact. Dust motes catch the emerging light. Professional minimal abstract art, genesis moment.

artworks.title: Golden Age Dawn
artworks.prompt: Dawn of a new intelligence era: massive golden sun rising over a landscape of crystalline formations and organic tech structures. Light rays break through cloud layer creating volumetric god-rays in gold (#F59E0B) and amber tones. Foreground: silhouette of diverse creator figures standing together looking at sunrise. Midground: hybrid organic-tech cityscape. Background: golden sky with constellation patterns visible through dawn light. Professional cinematic landscape, epic scale. 16:9.

artworks.title: Friendly Intelligence
artworks.prompt: Approachable AI character with warm, rounded design language. Soft white body with subtle blue accents. Large expressive eyes with inner warmth glow. Small friendly smile. Organic touches: wooden base, plant growing from shoulder joint. Sits on moss-covered stone. Soft natural lighting, white-to-cream background. Gentle shadow. Educational and approachable aesthetic — 'technology you'd invite to dinner'. Professional 3D character design, Pixar-inspired warmth.
